titleStmt.title: A sermon of Cuthbert Bysshop of Duresme made vpon Palme sondaye laste past, before the maiestie of our souerayne lorde kyng Henry the. VIII. kynge of England [and] of France, defensor of the fayth, lorde of Ireland, and in erth next vnder Christ supreme heed of the Churche of Englande.
Sermon made upon Palm Sunday
titleStmt.author: Tunstall, Cuthbert, 1474-1559.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Thomæ Bertheleti typis impress. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
